document_data.name: Wyvern Whiskey
document_data.mainbody: '''Wyvern whiskey''' was a rare and expensive strong distilled alcoholic drink exported from the mysterious island of [[Nimbral]].
document_data.Description: This exquisite [[whiskey]]'s most notable feature was a [[wyvern]]'s scale floating in every bottle. Due to its high price and rarity, wyvern whiskey was often counterfeited.
document_data.History: In the 1360s [[DR]], wyvern whiskey could be purchased at the [[House of Good Spirits]] in [[Waterdeep]]. In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a bottle of wyvern whiskey was kept in the [[Cloister of Sombre Embrace]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]].
